Level Two
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Two
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, July 14, 2001 - 05:14 am:

Stage 2

Move one step to the right,when you start the stage, jump up those "metal blocks",and go right. There will be a wooden box on your right,and destroy it and get a silver medal. Move right,and go down. Jump up those wooden boxes on your right twice,and wait for the jell to move to the next box which you are standing at,and once he is standing at the box on your right,destroy it,and the jell will fall and die. Jump up and right,and move right,downwards three steps. Destroy the box below and get a "silver plate." Go up the three metal steps,which you came down from just now. Face right,and create a box,after that,jump and stand on the box which you just have created. Create a box,below/next/right of you,and stand on it,and jump right,and stand on the metal step. Jump up/right again,and step on the metal block. Face left,and create a box. Than jump up on the box which you have just created. Face right,and create a box,and jump on it. Now,face left,and create a box,and jump on it. Face left,and create a box,and jump on it. Than,jump up,and take the gold key. Go down to the wooden box which you created just now,and destroy it. Jump down to the metal ledge and there you can see a "red monster" which keeps going left and right. Destroy the box,and you will get a firework. Wait until the monster is far away from you,than jump down leftwards. Than make use of time when the "red monster" is far away from your character,shoot the fireworks at it. IF YOU ARE FAST ENOUGH,YOU CAN ALSO NOT USE THE FIREWORK AND JUMP OVER THE "RED MONSTER." Jump up the metal steps on the left quickly after you destroyed the "red monster." Jump up twice. Face left,and create a box next/downwards/left to you,after that,climb on the box,and create another of the box,and destroy the box next to you,and get a "gold medal",and exit through the door,AND YOU WIN STAGE 2.
